title: SET_CLOUDS_ALPHA
content:
0xF36199225D6D8C86// SetCloudsAlpha
void SET_CLOUDS_ALPHA(float opacity);Parameters:opacity: The opacity value to set for clouds.Allows modification of the cloud opacity. It can also be used in other contexts, such as when the player is in a switch state IS_PLAYER_SWITCH_IN_PROGRESS.Old name:  _SET_CLOUD_HAT_OPACITYExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Check if the player is in a Switch "state"
if IsPlayerSwitchInProgress() then
    -- If the player is in a Switch state, set the clouds opacity to 1.0
    SetCloudsAlpha(1.0)
end
codeBlocks:
-- Check if the player is in a Switch "state"
if IsPlayerSwitchInProgress() then
    -- If the player is in a Switch state, set the clouds opacity to 1.0
    SetCloudsAlpha(1.0)
end
